gitHubInformation.name: Next.js
gitHubInformation.about: Next.js is a minimalistic framework for server-rendered React applications.
gitHubInformation.eli5: Next.js is a framework that simplifies building React applications that render on the server.

socialMediaTopPosts.title: Next.js 11.1: Faster Full-Stack Performance, Live Image Editing, Image Component, and more

gitHubInformation.name: Visual Studio Code
gitHubInformation.about: Visual Studio Code is a free source-code editor made by Microsoft for Windows, Linux and macOS.
gitHubInformation.eli5: Visual Studio Code is a free, cross-platform source code editor with a focus on productivity.

socialMediaTopPosts.title: Join us on May 6th for a special event celebrating 5 years of Visual StudioCode! üéâ We'll be reflecting on the journey so far and looking ahead to what's next. RSVP now: https://aka.ms/vscode5th #VSCodeTurns5

gitHubInformation.name: Docker
gitHubInformation.about: Docker is a set of platform-as-a-service products that use OS-level virtualization to deliver software in packages called containers.
gitHubInformation.eli5: Docker is a tool designed to make it easier to create, deploy, and run applications by using containers.

socialMediaTopPosts.title:
üëã Say hello to Docker 22.0! 

üî• Faster container builds with BuildKit and enhanced caching 
üê≥ New ARM64 architecture support
üåü Better Windows container support
üìù And more...

Learn about all the latest features and improvements üëâ https://dockr.ly/3lnmwAx

gitHubInformation.name: Kubernetes
gitHubInformation.about: Kubernetes is an open-source container orchestration platform that automates the deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications.
gitHubInformation.eli5: Kubernetes is like a conductor that helps manage and run multiple containers in a coordinated and efficient manner.

socialMediaTopPosts.title: We just released Kubernetes v1.22! üéâ
Kubernetes: An Introduction and Overview

gitHubInformation.name: GitHub CLI
gitHubInformation.about: GitHub CLI is a command-line tool that brings GitHub to your terminal.
gitHubInformation.eli5: GitHub CLI is like a Swiss Army knife for GitHub, allowing you to manage repositories, issues, pull requests, and more, all from the command line.

socialMediaTopPosts.title: GitHub CLI 2.0 is now available!
GitHub CLI 2.0: gh brings GitHub to the command line

gitHubInformation.name: Terraform
gitHubInformation.about: Terraform is an open-source infrastructure as code software tool that enables you to define and provision infrastructure resources in a declarative manner.
gitHubInformation.eli5: Terraform is like a blueprint for setting up and managing your infrastructure resources. It allows you to write code that describes your desired infrastructure state and automatically provisions and manages those resources.

socialMediaTopPosts.title: Terraform 1.1 is here with native support for AWS Cloud Control API, enhanced provider testing, and more!
Terraform 1.1: Native support for AWS Cloud Control API, enhanced provider testing

gitHubInformation.name: Ansible
gitHubInformation.about: Ansible is an open-source automation tool that allows you to automate provisioning, configuration management, and application deployment.
gitHubInformation.eli5: Ansible is like a robot that helps you automate repetitive tasks in setting up and managing computer systems. It can install software, configure settings, and perform other tasks across multiple servers.

socialMediaTopPosts.title: Ansible 2.12 is now available!
Ansible 2.12: Red Hat's automation framework for infrastructure and application deployment

gitHubInformation.name: GitLab
gitHubInformation.about: GitLab is a complete DevOps platform, delivered as a single application. It enables teams to collaborate, build, test, and deploy their code with integrated CI/CD, project management, and more.
gitHubInformation.eli5: GitLab is a platform that combines all the tools developers need to collaborate, build, test, and deploy their code.

socialMediaTopPosts.title: GitLab 14.3 is here with Compliance Dashboards, Incident Management, and Kubernetes Agent!

gitHubInformation.name: Grafana
gitHubInformation.about: Grafana is an open-source platform for monitoring and observability, allowing users to visualize and analyze their data from multiple sources.
gitHubInformation.eli5: Grafana is a tool that helps you monitor and analyze your data by creating interactive visualizations and dashboards.

socialMediaTopPosts.title:
Grafana 8.1 is here! üéâ

- New exploratory workflows
- Powerful transformations
- Customizable panels
- Enhancements to alerting and annotations
- And much more!

Check out the release notes: https://grafana.com/blog/2021/09/14/grafana-8.1-release-announcement/
